<DIV ALIGN="center">
<B>Uranium<BR>
<i>Z</i> = 92</B>

<FONT size="-1" face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif">ASCII format</FONT></DIV>
<PRE>____________________________________

     <B>Energy</B>       <i>&mu;</i>/<i>&rho;</i>        <i>&mu;</i><sub>en</sub>/<i>&rho;</i> 
     <SUP>&nbsp;</SUP>(MeV)      (cm<sup>2</sup>/g)     (cm<sup>2</sup>/g)
____________________________________

   1.00000E-03  6.626E+03  6.612E+03 
   1.02220E-03  6.375E+03  6.360E+03 
   1.04490E-03  6.127E+03  6.112E+03

   1.15314E-03  5.446E+03  5.431E+03
